Header.title: ONE STOP SOLUTION FOR ANY OIL SPILL PROBLEMS.
Header.paragraph: A Trusted Business Partner.Committed to Protect Environment

About.paragraph: Protecting Indonesia's Waters Since 2006. PT. Blue Ocean Sejahtera is an independent Indonesian company dedicated to safeguarding our marine environment. We design, manufacture, install, and commission cutting-edge oil spill response equipment for platforms, ships, jetties, drilling operations, and beyond. From our Jakarta headquarters and workshops in Bekasi and Sentul, our team of seasoned experts is committed to excellence. We're constantly pushing the boundaries of engineering to ensure that Indonesia's waters remain pristine for generations to come.

Services.name: Oil Boom
Services.text: A floating device used to contain oil on water, formed into a U-shape and towed downwind to trap the oil within its barrier.

Services.name: Skimmer
Services.text: A skimmer reads and stores credit card data from magnetic strips and is also used to remove oil from water, though debris can reduce its effectiveness.

Services.name: Response Boat
Services.text: The 45-foot response boat-medium is a versatile vessel used for rapid Coast Guard missions, patrols, and training from shore stations.

Services.name: Vaccum Truck
Services.text: A vacuum truck is a tank truck equipped with a pump that pneumatically sucks liquids, sludge, or slurries into its tank, often from underground locations.

Services.name: Dispersant Pump
Services.text: Oil spill dispersant spray systems are portable, lightweight units that can be quickly mounted on tugs and other vessels for rapid response to marine oil spill emergencies.

Services.name: Storage Tank
Services.text: A storage tank is designed to store liquids, primarily used in the petroleum industry, but also in sectors like food (oil storage) and fertilizer.

Services.name: Absorbent
Services.text: Absorbents are insoluble materials used to recover liquids by absorbing or adsorbing them. They retain liquids within their molecular structure, causing the material to swell by 50% or more.

Services.name: Waste Water Treatment Plant (WWTP)
Services.text: Wastewater treatment removes contaminants from wastewater and converts it into effluent that can safely re-enter the water cycle.

Team.name: OSPICO Oil Dispersant
Team.job: Pertamina UPMS-3 Unit TT Tanjung Gerem

Team.name: OSPICO Oil Skimmer OS-6T, Power Pack, Oil Boom OP-27

Projects.title: OIL SPILL
Projects.text: We provide rapid response solutions to contain and clean oil spills, protecting marine ecosystems from damage.

Projects.title: TRAINING
Projects.text: Our comprehensive training equips employees with the skills needed to effectively manage oil spills and ensure environmental safety.

Projects.title: DESIGN & MANUFACTURING
Projects.text: We design and manufacture specialized equipment to enhance efficiency in oil spill management and maritime infrastructure.

Projects.title: ASSESMENT
Projects.text: We offer thorough assessments to evaluate risks and ensure the implementation of safe, effective solutions for oil spill management.
